text: Penicillium persicinum is a species of fungus in the genus Penicillium which was isolated from soil from the Qinghai Province in China.UniProt Penicillium persicinum produces griseofulvin, lichexanthone, roquefortine C, roquefortine D, patulin and chrysogine == Further reading == * * == References == persicinum Category:Fungi described in 2004
title: Penicillium persicinum
